item.title: I-80 East - Exits 185 and 188B
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 185 - CA-89 South/Lake Tahoe. Advanced signage for Exit 188B - CA-89 North/CA-267/Sierraville/Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-50 West/CA-89 South at US-50/CA-89 Split
item.description: US-50 West/CA-89 south at US-50/CA-89 split roundabout.

item.title: US-50 West/CA-89 South Approaching CA-89
item.description: US-50 west/CA-89 south approaching CA-89/US-50 split.

item.title: US-50 West/CA-89 South - South Lake Tahoe
item.description: US-50 West/CA-89 South in South Lake Tahoe at B St.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-89
item.description: US-395 North at CA-89 North. Turn left on CA-89 for Markleeville.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-89
item.description: US-395 North approaching CA-89 to Markleeville and Monitor Pass. Monitor Pass was open when this picture was taken.

item.title: CA-299 West at CA-89
item.description: CA-299 west at CA-89 north to Burney Falls State Park, and south to Lassen National Park.

item.title: CA-299 West at CA-89
item.description: CA-299 west approaching CA-89 north to McArthur Burney Falls State Park, and south to Lassen National Park.

item.title: US-50 East/CA-89 North at US-50/CA-89 Split
item.description: US-50 East/CA-89 North at US-50/CA-89 split. Turn right to continue east on US-50 for Stateline (Nevada); continue north on CA-89 for Emerald Bay and Tahoe City.

item.title: US-50 East/CA-89 North at US-50/CA-89 Split
item.description: US-50 East/CA-89 North at US-50/CA-89 Split in South Lake Tahoe. Turn right to continue east on US-50.

item.title: US-50 East/CA-89 North Approaching Split
item.description: US-50 East/CA-89 North Approaching US-50/CA-89 split. Merge right for US-50 east to Lake Tahoe Nevada; continue straight for CA-89 north to Tahoe City.

item.title: US-50 East - South Lake Tahoe
item.description: South Lake Tahoe City Limit on US-50 eastbound.

item.title: US-50 East At CA-89
item.description: US-50 east at CA-89 south to Markleeville and Jackson (via CA-88). Continue straight ahead for US-50 East/CA-89 north to South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-50 East At CA-89 South
item.description: US-50 east at CA-89 south/Markleeville/Jackson to CA-88. CA-89 north joins US-50 east to South Lake Tahoe. Entering Meyers.

item.title: US-50 East at CA-89 Junction
item.description: US-50 East at CA-89 Junction in Meyers.

item.title: US-50 East at CA-89
item.description: US-50 east at CA-89. Turn right for CA-89 south. CA-89 north joins US-50 eastbound to South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-89 North at US-50
item.description: CA-89 North at US-50 in Meyers. Turn left on US-50 west for Placerville; right for US-50 East/CA-89 North to South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-89 North - Meyers City Limit
item.description: Meyers City Limit on CA-89 north.

item.title: CA-89 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-89 north. Distance to Meyers, Lake Tahoe, and Truckee.

item.title: CA-88 West/CA-89 North at CA-88/CA-89 Split
item.description: CA-88 West/CA-89 North at CA-89 North. Turn right for CA-89 north to Meyers and Lake Tahoe. Continue west on CA-88 to Jackson. Turn right for Burnside Lake Road.

item.title: CA-89 North/CA-88 West approaching CA-89/CA-88 Split
item.description: CA-89 North/CA-88 West approaching CA-89 north. Use CA-89 north for Meyers and Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-89 North at CA-88
item.description: CA-89 North at CA-88 in Woodfords. Turn right for CA-88 east to Minden (Nevada). Turn left for CA-88 West/CA-89 North to Jackson (via CA-88) and Lake Tahoe (via CA-89). CA-89 joins CA-88 to Sorensens.

item.title: CA-89 North Approaching CA-88
item.description: CA-89 North Approaching CA-88 in Woodfords.

item.title: CA-89 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-89 north. Distance to Woodfords, Minden (Nevada), and Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-89 North at CA-4
item.description: CA-89 North at CA-4. Turn left for CA-4 west to Angels Camp and Stockton (via Ebbetts Pass). Turn right for CA-89 north to Markleeville and Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-89 North - Elevation 8000 Feet
item.description: Elevation 8000 Feet on CA-89 north. Taken on north descent from Monitor Pass.

item.title: CA-89 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-89 north. Distance to Markleeville, Woodfords, and Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-89 North - Alpine County Line
item.description: Alpine County Line on CA-89 north. Open range.

item.title: CA-89 North - Begin Scenic Route
item.description: Begin Scenic Route on CA-89 north.

item.title: CA-89 North - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker on CA-89 north. Distance to CA-4 Jct., Markleeville, and Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-89 North
item.description: US-395 south at CA-89 north to Markleeville. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-89
item.description: US-395 south at CA-89 North to Markleeville and Monitor Pass. Monitor Pass was open when this was taken. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: CA-88 East/CA-89 South Approaching CA-89 Jct.
item.description: CA-88 East/CA-89 South approaching CA-89/(To) CA-4 junction. Use CA-89 south for CA-4 and Markleeville.

item.title: CA-88 East/CA-89 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on CA-88 East/CA-89 South. Distance to Woodfords, Markleeville, and Minden (Nevada).

item.title: CA-89 South at CA-88
item.description: CA-89 south at CA-88 junction. Turn right for CA-88 west; turn left for CA-88 East/CA-89 South.

item.title: CA-89 South Approaching CA-88
item.description: CA-89 South approaching CA-88. Use CA-88 west for Kirkwood and Jackson. Use CA-89 South/CA-89 East for Markleeville and Woodfords. CA-89 south joins CA-88 east to Woodfords.

item.title: CA-89 South - Alpine County
item.description: Alpine County Line on CA-89 south. Alpine County is the smallest county in California by population. CA-89 is posted as a scenic route.

item.title: CA-89 South - Luther Pass
item.description: Luther Pass - Elevation 7740 Feet. Luther Pass is on the divide between the Lake Tahoe Basin (to the north) and the Carson River.

item.title: CA-89 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-89 south. Distance to CA-88 Junction.

item.title: CA-89 South - Summit Information
item.description: Summit closure information on CA-89 south. Information for Ebbetts Pass (via CA-4), Monitor Pass (via CA-89) and Carson Pass (via CA-88). This photograph was taken in mid-June, and all of the passes are open. Carson Pass on CA-88 is the only pass that is typically opened year round.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188B Offramp at CA-89/CA-267
item.description: I-80 east Exit 188B offramp at CA-89/CA-267 junction. Turn left for CA-89 north to Sierraville. Turn right for CA-267 south to Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-395 North - Sierra Nevada Pass Information
item.description: Sierra Nevada mountain pass information on US-395 north. This sign shows the status of CA-120 (Tioga Pass), CA-108 (Sonora Pass), and CA-89 (Monitor Pass). At the time this picture was taken, the only pass still closed was Tioga Pass.

item.title: Begin CA-267 East at I-80
item.description: Begin CA-267 east at I-80. Turn right for I-80 east to Reno (Exit 188B); continue ahead for CA-267 east to Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 736
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 736 - CA-89/Lassen National Park/McCloud. This is the northern end of CA-89, which runs generally along the east side of the Sierra Nevada.

item.title: US-50 East At CA-89 South
item.description: US-50 east at CA-89 south/Markleeville/Jackson to CA-88. CA-89 north joins US-50 east to South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-50 East at CA-89
item.description: US-50 east at CA-89 south.

item.title: CA-49 South/CA-89 North at Split
item.description: CA-49 south at CA-89 north split. CA-89 turns left here towards Calpine, Graeagle, Blairsden, and Quincy.

item.title: CA-89 North/CA-49 South - Sattley
item.description: CA-89 North/CA-49 South in Sattley.

item.title: CA-89 North/CA-49 South at Westside Road
item.description: CA-89 North/CA-49 South at Westside Road to Beckwourth and Portola.

item.title: CA-89 North at CA-49
item.description: CA-89 North at CA-49. CA-89 north joins CA-49 south to Sattley.

item.title: CA-89 North Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-89 north at CA-49. Use CA-49 north for Loyalton. Use CA-49 South/CA-89 North for Quincy and Downieville.

item.title: US-50 West/CA-89 South at CA-89 South
item.description: US-50 West/CA-89 south at US-50/CA-89 split. Use CA-89 south for CA-88/Markleeville/Jackson

item.title: US-50 West/CA-89 South at Inspection Station
item.description: US-50 west/CA-89 south approaching the California State Agricultural Inspection Station.

item.title: US-50 West/CA-89 South Approaching CA-89
item.description: US-50 west/CA-89 south approaching CA-89/US-50 split.

item.title: I-80 East Advanced for Exit 188B
item.description: Advanced signage for Exit 188B - CA-267/North Lake Tahoe. Approaching Exit 185 - CA-89 south, Lake Tahoe. Both CA-89 and CA-267 connect Truckee with the north shore of Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188A and Exit 188B
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 188A - Truckee and approaching Exit 188B - CA-89/Sierraville/CA-89/Lake Tahoe

item.title: I-80 East Exit 185
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 185 - CA-89 South/Lake Tahoe. The exit number has not yet been posted on this sign.

item.title: CA-49 South/CA-89 North Split
item.description: CA-49 south at CA-89 north split. CA-89 turns left here towards Calpine, Graeagle, Blairsden, and Quincy.

item.title: CA-89 North/CA-49 South
item.description: CA-49 South/CA-89 North shields north of Sierraville.

item.title: CA-49 South at CA-89
item.description: CA-49 south at CA-89 south to Truckee. CA-89 north joins CA-49 south to Sattley.

item.title: I-80 East Exits 188A and 188B
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 188A - Truckee and approaching Exit 188B - CA-89/Sierraville/CA-267/Lake Tahoe

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188B
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 188B - CA-89/Sierraville/CA-267/Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188B
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 188B - CA-89/Sierraville/CA-267/Lake Tahoe

item.title: I-80 East Exit 185
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 185 - CA-89 South/Lake Tahoe. The exit number has not yet been posted on this sign.

item.title: CA-299 West at CA-89
item.description: CA-299 west approaching CA-89 north to McArthur-Burney Falls State Park, and south to Lassen Park.

item.title: CA-299 West at CA-89
item.description: CA-299 west at CA-89 north to Burney Falls State Park, and south to Lassen Park.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 185
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 185, CA-89 South/Lake Tahoe

item.title: I-80 West Exit 188
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 188, CA-267/CA-89 North/Lake Tahoe/Sierraville, 1 mile.

item.title: CA-70 East at CA-89
item.description: CA-70 east, CA-89 north junction near Crescent Mills.

item.title: CA-89 North at CA-147
item.description: CA-89 north approaching CA-147 for the eastern shore of Lake Almanor in Canyon Dam.

item.title: CA-89 North at CA-147
item.description: CA-89 north at CA-147 north junction in Canyon Dam.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 188
item.description: I-80 west at CA-89 North/CA-267 at Exit 188 on I-80 west, Truckee.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-89 North
item.description: Distance marker to Markleeville on US-395 north at CA-89 junction in Topaz. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-89
item.description: US-395 north at CA-89 junction to Markleeville and Monitor Pass in Topaz. Monitor Pass is closed when this was taken.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 185
item.description: CA-89 South/Lake Tahoe Exit on I-80 East

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188A
item.description: Approaching CA-89/CA-267 Exit on I-80 East. This was taken during the construction for the new interchange resulting in Exits 188AB.
